title: Bloomberg Markets: Faburiq Draws on Lowell's Roots for Fashion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Faburiq Draws on Lowell's Roots for Fashion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Aruña Chong Quiroga\u0010Founder and Designer\u0010Faburiq\u0010Discussing the online men's Haberdashery and modern accessories store and using the manufacturing history of Lowell, MA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
